lore: As a result of their mutation, Wolpertingers do not need to sleep. However, their visual system is not prepared to guide them through the darkness. The Smiths of the Scarlet Mountains take advantage of this to lay traps during the night.\n\nVolcanic Wolpertingers usually choose warm places to establish their territory. Legend has it that the entrance to the Great Pandemonium is actually in the Frostbite Caverns, which would explain why these creatures can sometimes be found in such a cold place.
menagerieDialog: (It's curled up into a little ball with its eyes half-closed. A nap is imminent.)
(You're constantly amazed at how violent this creature is. Even after it has slain its foes, it continues goring them with its horn.)
(It's eating a pile of trash. Hm. To each his own.)
(It bucks at the air anxiously. Perhaps a drugged carrot will settle it down.)
(The creature is growling at you. Unfortunately for it, you can't take it seriously at all since it has a piece of food caught between its teeth.)
name: Volcanic Wolpertinger
